HYIPS_PAGE.NEW_HERE: New here ? Need more infos about HYIP ? Click here

DEFINITION.PART_ONE: High Yield Investment Program, HYIP are (really) high yield financial programs
DEFINITION.PART_TWO: If you get used to your interest at 0.5% per year from your bank, you might quickly hallucinate.
DEFINITION.PART_THREE: Most of these programs offer 1% daily interest, or even a lot more!
DEFINITION.PART_FOUR: But beware, a large part of these websites are or will become scams where registered members will lose their invested capital .
DEFINITION.PART_FIVE: And that's where I come in! And yes, even if it is risky, it can be very profitable if you choose well and make the right investment.
DEFINITION.PART_SIX: You will be able to see for yourself on the sheets of each site some sums that I was able to win! It's possible for you too!
DEFINITION.PART_SEVEN: On each details sheet, you will be able to see a presentation of each site / company as well as my opinion based on several criteria.
DEFINITION.PART_HEIGHT: And to help you even more, I also added the sites that I tested and which did not work, that will prevent you to be trapped!
DEFINITION.PART_NINE:
I strongly advise you to give yourself a private equity (which is an amount that you are ready to lose!) And to divide your investments on several sites.
I even indicate to you the percentage of your capital that I think is the best for each site.

INDEX.PART_ONE: In search of financial freedom , I am a young active 30 years old looking for good deals on the Internet to earn money and in particular passive income
INDEX.PART_TWO: This site was designed to share all my tips and advice. Unlike some other sites, I test all that I offer beforehand. And I share with you both my successes and my unsuccessful attempts.
INDEX.PART_THREE: At the moment I'm very interested in HYIP (High Yield Investment Program) type sites, but I intend to diversify by investing in real estate and trading.
INDEX.PART_FOUR: My goal is to develop a supportive community, if you want to participate, do not hesitate to:
INDEX.PART_SIX: Test and give feedback on my tips
INDEX.PART_SEVEN: Share this site and the articles around you
